author: The B1M
description:
Fred Mills uncovers Japan's epic plan to disaster-proof Tokyo.
Tackle your toughest projects with confidence using InEight’s project controls software for capital construction - https://bit.ly/408huQh

Full story here: https://theb1m.com/video/the-100bn-plan-to-save-tokyo
